Sentencas: The cathode properties are critical for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) performance and a major challenge for commercialization.
Titulo: Nanostructured Mg-doped Mn-Cr spinel oxide cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells with optimized performance

Sentencas: This study employs the impregnation method to produce uniformly distributed Mg-doped manganese-chromium spinel oxide nanoparticles infiltrated into a network on the Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 (GDC) skeleton as SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Nanostructured Mg-doped Mn-Cr spinel oxide cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells with optimized performance

Sentencas: The effects of Mg doping on the performance of these nanostructured spinel oxides are investigated.
Titulo: Nanostructured Mg-doped Mn-Cr spinel oxide cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells with optimized performance

Sentencas: Both experimental results and density functional theory (DFT) calculations demonstrate that Mg doping can optimize the electronic structure of the manganese-chromium spinel oxide, increase the oxygen vacancy concentration, and significantly enhance the electrical conductivity and oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) catalytic activity.
Titulo: Nanostructured Mg-doped Mn-Cr spinel oxide cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells with optimized performance

Sentencas: The Mg-doped manganese-chromium spinel oxide cathode exhibits superior perfor-mance, with an area-specific polarization resistance of 0.33 omega cm2 and a maximum power density of 976 mW cm_2 at 800 degrees C. Moreover, the nanostructures of the cathode barely change after 100 h of cell operation.
Titulo: Nanostructured Mg-doped Mn-Cr spinel oxide cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells with optimized performance

Sentencas: These findings provide a new strategy for optimizing the performance of SOFC spinel oxide cathodes.
Titulo: Nanostructured Mg-doped Mn-Cr spinel oxide cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells with optimized performance
